Package Pump

Class PumpThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Pump.PumpThread

  • public class PumpThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    PumpThread class that creates additional functionality needed for our threads while running a PumpKiosk
    Author:
    tymcb

        gasType - Type of gas to be pumped
        gasAmount - Amount of gas to be pumped in gallons
